body: Erwin in The Latin Americanist reports: "At least 260 women and young girls in Argentina were killed in 2010 including eleven via incineration according to local NGO La Casa del Encuentro. [...] last week alone three women were killed via incineration."
original_body: Erwin in The Latin Americanist reports: "At least 260 women and young girls in Argentina were killed in 2010 including eleven via incineration according to local NGO La Casa del Encuentro. [...] last week alone three women were killed via incineration."
title: Argentina: 260 Women Killed in 2010; 11 via Incineration

sentence: Erwin in The Latin Americanist reports: "At least 260 women and young girls in Argentina were killed in 2010 including eleven via incineration according to local NGO La Casa del Encuentro.
[...] last week alone three women were killed via incineration."
